title: Video game industry 's wealthiest entrepreneurs 2016
yAxis: Net worth in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Entrepreneur (company) in the x axis and Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) has the highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars and Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon) has the lowest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars.
The difference of Net worth in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Entrepreneur (company) is 18.4.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net worth in billion U.S. dollars for 5 number of Entrepreneur (company)s.
Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) has the highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars and Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon) has the lowest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Entrepreneur (company) in the x axis and Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) has the highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars and Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon) has the lowest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars.
The difference of Net worth in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Entrepreneur (company) is 18.4.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Entrepreneur (company), and Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in each Entrepreneur (company) on the y axis.
Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) has the highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars and Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon) has the lowest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars.
Entrepreneur (company) William Ding (NetEase) has the second highest value for Net worth in billion U.S. dollars.
The minimum Entrepreneur (company) Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon) has got 6.26 times less Net worth in billion U.S. dollars than the maximum Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent).

The Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) has the highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars, followed by William Ding (NetEase), and Shi Yuzhu (Giant Interactive). Down to the Entrepreneur (company) Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon) which is the lowest.
The Entrepreneur (company) Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon) has 2.32 times less Net worth in billion U.S. dollars than average.
Summing up the values of all Entrepreneur (company)s, we get total 47.2.
